sections.heading: pursuit; section, how construed
sections.text: Section 29-416 shall not be construed so as to make unlawful any arrest in this state which would otherwise be lawful.SourceLaws 1937, c. 70, § 3, p. 256;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 29-418;R.S.1943, § 29-418.

29-418.Fresh pursuit; section, how construed.

Section 29-416 shall not be construed so as to make unlawful any arrest in this state which would otherwise be lawful.

SourceLaws 1937, c. 70, § 3, p. 256;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 29-418;R.S.1943, § 29-418.
